text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
—— This Fan Festival's Clan Clash will soon get underway! 
Large crowds are forming around the monitors streaming 
the event right now!!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: —— Kyaaah～! Gimlet, Kris, my queens! Oguriiiin!!! —— Hayahide～! Overwhelm them with your amazing strategies～!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: The Ro and Ha clans, both favorites to win, are as popular as you'd expect～! Well then, the time is here! The time to fight, and survive as victor of these turbulent times! To arms～!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I clan general Yaeno Muteki… taking the field!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Hwoooooooooooh!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's follow our strategy. We move out to crush 
the Ho clan right next to us immediately.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Understoood～ I'll expertly bring down their flag from afar…! 
It's the ninja's time to shine straight away, isn't it♪

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Mhm, I leave it to thee! But do take care. Remember thou dost not carry a katana as ninja. Let us take care of things until thou art in range for the shuriken— Hm? Look there!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
T-That's…!? Damn it! 
It's Gimlet with a bunch of the Ro clan…!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
They've drawn this near so quickly…!? 
The Ho clan's general lies defeated already!

text_block_list.name: [Ho Clan] General
text_block_list.text: Keh, they're strong! Gimlet is making a spectacle of fighting us head on… while Kris S is sneaking around our backs like a shadow… What could we have even done!

text_block_list.name: [Ho Clan] General
text_block_list.text:
There's no way we could have won… The lot of you managed 
to live, at least. Fight to the end, even if it's under the Ro clan～!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Grrrrrr～～! If only we had acted with slightly more haste, they would have joined our ranks!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Shh～～! …Oh no, we've been found～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Keh…! Change of plan, we should retreat for now! Escape to a safe place however you can!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— Deeyaaaah!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Darn it! They're so strong! But… they won't stand 
a chance if we surround them and strike all at once! 
Everyone, chaaaarge!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Guhh…!?

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: A hit! I did it…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: So what! I only took 1 hit!! Haaaa——!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Waaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Yaeno Muteki wipes out a small group! But as you 
would expect, it has taken its toll, dropping her down 
to 2 lives early on in the game!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Waah, Yaeno～! We're already not looking so good, are we!? And they just keep coming! Is there no end to them!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
There's no need to be flustered. Right now we must 
reconvene with Taishin and the others!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap's Ro clan leads a fierce attack! Meanwhile, likely per 
Hayahide's strategy, the Ha clan's influence creeps steadily 
closer! Has the I clan noticed the dire straits they're in～!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Damn it, they completely beat us to the punch…!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
How troubling～ We have the Ro clan on one side, 
and the Ha clan on the other…

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
We really done got ourselves caught between the favorites. 
'Twill be only a matter of time before we find ourselves 
in real trouble now…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Our strategy has failed, has it. With such ease, too. 
What should we do…

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
It's alright, we haven't lost just yet…! Even if we have 
no chance of winning, I won't lose my will to fight…!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
You said it yourself when we were dispirited. 
And we all promised… that we'd rise up!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……! Indeed, you are entirely correct.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Let us regain our composure and regroup. 
A good opportunity will come to us eventually.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
That's our general! So dependable～ 
Alright, everyone, let's think up a new strategy.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Our efforts will never betray us. It's crucial that 
we continue fighting without losing heart.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (That's right, if we don't give in, we will prevail eventually…!)
